+            const userData = response.data?.data?.user || response.data?.user || response.user
+            
+            if (!userData) {
+                console.error('‚ùå [Frontend] No user data in response')
+                setToast('Invalid response from server')
+                return
+            }
+            
+            console.log('üë§ [Frontend] User data received:', { 
+                name: userData.name, 
+                email: userData.email, 
+                userType: userData.userType 
+            })
+            
+            // Verify this is a corporate user
+            if (userData.userType !== 'Corporate') {
+                console.error('‚ùå [Frontend] User is not corporate type:', userData.userType)
                 setToast('This login is for corporate users only')
                 return
             }
 
+            // Update auth context if login function is available
+            if (login && typeof login === 'function') {
+                console.log('üìù [Frontend] Updating auth context...')
+                await login(userData, response.data?.data?.token || response.data?.token || response.token)
+            }
+
             // Success - redirect to corporate home
+            console.log('‚úÖ [Frontend] Corporate login successful')
             setToast('Login successful!')
             setTimeout(() => {
                 router.push('/CorporateHome')
             }, 1000)
             
         } catch (error) {
-            console.error('Login error:', error)
-            setToast(error.message || 'Login failed. Please try again.')
